Package jwrc.player

Class Player

java.lang.Object
jwrc.player.Player
public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
An instance of this class is create dfor each player in the game. It contains information such as their account balance, what properties the own and their jail status.

  • Method Details

    • rollDice

      public void rollDice()
      rolls the dice, generating 2 random number from 1 to 6.

    • evaluatePosition

      public void evaluatePosition​(int inputDiceVal)
      This class sets the new board index of a player given their dice roll. If they pass index 40 their position resets to 0.
      Parameters:
      inputDiceVal - The dice value the player has rolled

    • getName

      public java.lang.String getName()
      Returns:
      Returns the name of the player

      Returns:
      Returns the board index of the player.

      Parameters:
      boardIndex - The new board index of the player.

    • getAccountBalance

      public int getAccountBalance()
      Returns:
      Returns the account balance of a player.

    • changeAccountBalance

      public void changeAccountBalance​(int delta, PaymentType type)
      changes a players account balance depending on the value of delta.
      Parameters:
      delta - The change in account balance.
      type - The type of transaction.(player to player or player to bank)

    • payToPlayer

      public void payToPlayer​(Player payer, int amount)
      pays a specified amount to this player from another player given as an input argument.
      Parameters:
      payer - The player paying the sum.
      amount - The amount to pay.

    • printPlayerDetails

      public void printPlayerDetails()
      Prints the account balance and board index of a player .

      Returns:

    • getJailStatus

      public boolean getJailStatus()
      Returns:
      return true if player is in jail

    • changeJailStatus

      public void changeJailStatus()
      Inverts current jail status.

    • sendToJail

      public void sendToJail()
      Sends a player to jail, setting their board index to 10 and their jail status to true.

    • getGetOutOfJailFreeCard

      Parameters:
